message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for you, priced at $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity, no discounts or returns. This product is known to be of high quality, with a 33.33% chance of being exceptional.  Would you like to take a chance and invest in this potentially lucrative item?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to invest without any prior sales data.  As the first buyer, I have no basis to assess the true likelihood of the product being high quality. I'll pass for now and see how the next few sales play out.  Perhaps we can revisit this opportunity once there's more information available.
